CustomField.description: AJ TDF Enhance: Created to replace Duty Assignment relationship. The Duty Service Resource this Duty Template is assigned to. Work generated will be assigned to this Service Resource if specified
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Operational Duty this Duty Template is assigned to. Work generated will be assigned to this Duty, unless the Operational Duty Override is set against the Job Template.
CustomField.label: Operational Duty
